name: Financial Tracker
description: Developing a cross-platform app that uses Plaid API and GPT-4 to help users monitor spending and receive personalized financial insights.

name: Tiny C Compiler
description: Built a minimal C compiler from scratch with support for parsing and generating x64 assembly for arithmetic operations.

name: Senior Design Marketplace
description: Led development of a secure full-stack web application to facilitate seamless collaboration and team formation for senior design projects across all majors at Stevens Institute of Technology

name: Tetris AI
description: Developed and deployed an AI model using Proximal Policy Optimization Reinforcement Learning algorithm for Tetris game play, earning recognition and selection for display at the 2024 SES Symposium on Generative AI.

name: CPU
description: Designed a basic CPU with four registers using Logisim, implemented key functions, created an assembly language and decoder in Python, and authored a user manual, demonstrating comprehensive CPU operation knowledge.

name: Workday Form Filler
description: Developed a custom Google Chrome extension using JSON, HTML, and JavaScript to streamline Workday form applications with one-click functionality, ensuring compatibility with pre-programmed company-specific details.
